meanings.definition: A shaft with a crank attached, used to convert reciprocating motion into rotational motion.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic explained how crankshafts help turn the engine's movement smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The car's crankshafts were carefully inspected during the tune-up.
meanings.sent3: When the crankshafts went on strike, the engine just couldn't rotate properly!
meanings.sent4: The crankshafts of the old clock were like the beating heart of the timepiece.
meanings.sent5: The shiny crankshafts gleamed under the mechanic's flashlight.

meanings.definition: The main rotating component of an engine that converts the linear motion of the pistons into rotational motion.
meanings.sent1: Crankshafts play a crucial role in turning the up-and-down motion of pistons into circular movement.
meanings.sent2: The engineer designed a new crankshaft for the high-performance engine.
meanings.sent3: The crankshafts in the engine had a dance party, spinning round and round!
meanings.sent4: The crankshafts hummed a tune as they transformed the engine's power.
meanings.sent5: The powerful crankshafts were like magic wands, spinning the engine to life.
